entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or ice pellets with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Flurries or periods of ice pellets early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
